message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its potential worth to you, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,350,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, of course.

Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of its worth. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider a price up to $1,200,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I understand your budget constraints, the value of this product is significant. How about we meet in the middle at $1,275,000?  I believe this reflects a fair deal for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After considering our positions, I would like to propose a price of $1,250,000 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise while still being mindful of my budget.
